item.title: Hands on the Avi Kubernetes Operator (AKO)
item.author: robert.guske@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Robert Guske
item.description: A hands on guide which covers the deployment and configuration of the Avi Kubernetes Operator and to ultimately integrate it with the NSX Advanced Load Balancer to make use of the modern and comprehensive features of VMware's Next Gen Load Balancer.

item.title: Leveraging Fluent Bit on Tanzu Kubernetes Grid to send VEBA logs to vRealize Log Insight
item.author: robert.guske@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Robert Guske
item.description: A guide how to leverage the open source project FluentBit to forward logs from a Tanzu Kubernetes Cluster to vRealize Log Insight.

item.title: vSphere with Tanzu - Troubleshooting HAProxy deployment
item.author: robert.guske@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Robert Guske
item.description: What I've learned from troubleshooting a failed vSphere with Tanzu HAProxy deployment.

item.title: VMware Event Broker Appliance - vSphere HA Event Notification Function
item.author: robert.guske@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Robert Guske
item.description: A post about a community function contribution to the open source project VMware Event Broker Appliance to notify you if a ESXi host failure occured.

item.title: Monitoring the VMware Event Broker Appliance with vRealize Operations Manager
item.author: robert.guske@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Robert Guske
item.description: This post covers how to monitor the VMware Event Broker Appliance (VM), plus it's Kubernetes components like the Control Plane (Master), the Node(s) as well as the Pods by using vRealize Operations Manager.

item.title: Event-driven interactions with vSphere using Functions as a Service
item.author: robert.guske@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Robert Guske
item.description: A time pre project VMware Event Broker Appliance
